snippet: Poor Joe Nocera, the Yankees fan of Randolph, N.J., has been getting some pretty insulting Twitter messages. But they weren’t meant for him.
abstract: Joe Nocera Op-Ed column acknowledges that Twitter may have some undeniable virtues but holds it is ultimately a frivolous, vain and reactionary medium that often brings out the worst in people; says service, with its 140-character limit, reflects a society-wide attention deficit disorder.
lead_paragraph: Poor Joe Nocera, the Yankees fan of Randolph, N.J., has been getting some pretty insulting Twitter messages. But they weren’t meant for him.
